PCI.Name: PC Importer
PCI.ImportDialog.TITLE: Import PC
PCI.ImportDialog.CONTENT: PC Importer imports characters using XML or JSON export created from a different system. This version works primarily with MPMB sheets.
PCI.ImportDialog.Update.CONTENT: Consider exporting or duplicating your character first. This import  will update the data for this Actor and cannot be un-done.
PCI.ImportDialog.Create.CONTENT: This import will create a new character Actor, even if you already have one by the imported name.
PCI.Import.BUTTON: Import a Player Character (PC) from another system or character sheet
PCI.Compendia.SubMenu.LABEL: Select Compendiums
